item.title: Videographer - Upwork
item.description:
I am starting a YouTube channel about healthy eating/ I need someone to help shoot a short video. These are the scenes of the video:
0. I introduce myself and my channel 1 minute
1. I am speaking to a client on phone 1 minutes
2. I make grocery list for her 1 minutes
3. I go shipping at Trader Joes and Wholefoods in Glendale 3 minutes each
4. I prepare some of her food in my kitchen 30 minutes
5. I arrive to her house in Atwater and get out of my car with the groceries/food 1 minute
6, I greet her at her door 1 minute
7. I walk into her kitchen and showed her what I got her 5 minutes

Total shooting time less than 45 minutes
Driving time from market to my kitchen to her kitchen around one hour
Then time to edit the video down to around 20 minutes

If this is successful. I might do similar videos weekly




Budget: $50
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:26 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Event Photography, Videography, Video Editing
Skills: Event Photography, Videography, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Weekly Church Service Recording and YouTube Upload Specialist Needed ( Memphis, TN) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a dedicated and skilled videographer to record our Sunday church services in Memphis, TN, and upload the footage to our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will have experience in live event recording and video editing, ensuring high-quality content is delivered consistently.

Responsibilities:
Record Sunday church services every week.
Edit the recorded footage for clarity and professionalism.
Upload the edited video to our YouTube channel promptly after each service.
Requirements:

Experience in videography and video editing.
Own recording equipment (camera, tripod, microphones).
Reliable transportation to and from the church location in Memphis, TN.
Ability to deliver videos in a timely manner.

Please provide samples of previous work, specifically any live event recordings.
Include a brief description of your experience and why you are the ideal candidate for this role.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Marketing, Video Editing, Communications
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Marketing, Video Editing, Communications
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply
